# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your daily experience. It's designed to meet various needs and provide unparalleled benefits. Considering its high quality and functionality, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone like you who appreciates exceptional value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your routine! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
